title: I Went to Vassar for This?
description: When a microwave malfunction transports her back in time to 1959, trendy Manhattanite Cathy Voorhees finds herself in a world devoid of PalmPilots, the Internet, and cell phones, where she, while trying to find a way back, vows to change history--with a little help from her handsome neighbor. Original.
author: Naomi Neale
